title: Debug meeting page URL path issue
description:
The URL http://localhost:8000/ga/plenary/80/ga/plenary/80/meetings/2026-01-26-informal-meeting-of-the-plenary-on-the-un80-initiative/index.html is not loading correctly.

Observations:
- URL has duplicate path segments: /ga/plenary/80/ga/plenary/80/ (should only be /ga/plenary/80/ once)
- The actual file exists at: output/ga/plenary/80/meetings/2026-01-26-informal-meeting-of-the-plenary-on-the-un80-initiative/index.html

Possible causes:
- Base URL configuration issue in config.yaml
- Incorrect path generation in template links
- URL builder function bug in builder.py
- Meeting URL generation function issue

Expected behavior:
- URLs should be: /ga/plenary/80/meetings/2026-01-26-informal-meeting-of-the-plenary-on-the-un80-initiative/index.html
- NOT: /ga/plenary/80/ga/plenary/80/meetings/...

Need to investigate and fix the path generation logic.

title: Optimize menu styling with Tailwind CSS
description:
The current menu implementation is inconsistent and messy. The mega menus and navigation need to be refactored to use proper Tailwind CSS classes for consistent spacing, hover states, transitions, and responsive behavior.

Current issues:
- Inconsistent spacing and padding
- Missing hover/focus states
- No smooth transitions
- Mobile menu needs improvement
- Mega menu positioning is fragile
- Inconsistent typography and colors

Expected changes:
- Use Tailwind utility classes for all menu styling
- Add proper hover and focus states
- Add smooth transitions and animations
- Fix mobile navigation toggle
- Improve mega menu positioning and responsiveness
- Ensure consistent typography across menu items
